name: F.R.G. 2.0
description:
the sequel to F.R.G.(or a fully realized version of it)

(screenshots are not of the final version of the game)

in F.R.G. 2.0 you play as FRG-02, a robot made by the robotics company F.R.C. (Fun Robot Corporation)

run and jump through dozens of levels 

it has:

  • kinda good pixel art
  • pretty good music by psycoffman
  • over 50 levels
  • tons of useless coins bits to collect
  • many secrets, most of which most likely will never be found, mostly due to the lack of a big enough fan base for this game
  • special levels, such as Space, Snow, and more!
  • playable with only 1 hand*
  • doors
  • platforms
  • the color beige
  • and more!
  • (also includes a bonus game: Box Game)

*when playing with a keyboard
